#summary A Dock Agent manages your docks for you.
#labels DockAgent

= Dock Agent =

This agent will sell goods from it's homebase equipment dock that are not set for _capacity_; sell wares that exceed the set capacity; and buy any items set to _buy_(up to capacity).

_Note: Dock agents will not waste their time selling wares worth less then 20,000 credits._

See [Feature_Dockware_Manager Dockware Manager] for more information.


== Required Equipment ==
 
-Valid Homebase that is a dock<br>
-Little ship<br>
-Trade Command Software Mk1<br> 
-Trade Command Software MK2<br>
-Trade System Extension<br>
-Station Agent Software <br>
